Methods in se.nicklasgavelin.bluetooth that return RemoteDevice
 RemoteDevice BluetoothDevice.getRemoteDevice()
          Returns the remote device, this remote device shouldn't be used except when absolutely necessary as the BluetoothDevice class should handle all communications with the RemoteDevice class instance.
